fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Duel someone every night. The host will organize a time for you two to play chess. If the Pirate wins, their target is attacked. Losing chess warrants assault I guess.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Playing chess roleblocks your target because multitasking is hard.
- Upon winning, you get access to your victims' player channels and <#970059745807437876>, though you may not post anything besides pictures of grapes. You also die.
